ModMetaData.name: Timelapse 2023
ModMetaData.author: The Village Guy
ModMetaData.description: Create timelapses from PR renders [IMPORTANT] This mod requires Windows x64! Other operating systems are not supported Using the progress renderer mod you can make renders. Tell Timelapse 2023 where they are, set your output quality and it will make a timelapse for you. Default output folder: My Documents/Rimworld Renders/ This mod (2000) was originally made by Epicguru (James B) It is much appreciated in the https://rimworld.gallery community. Sadly, he announced abandoning it in 2020: "As of May 2022, I will no longer be updating my Rimworld mods until further notice, although if a new version of Rimworld is released, I may make an effort to port my mods." As people are asking for it to be updated and we are now two Rimworld versions ahead, I (TVG) am now (Oct 2023) taking over the maintenance of this mod. I will not be improving it, just making it work on all Rimworld versions. Epicguru, thanks for this mod!
